author: camckay
body: There is a hard dependency on libicu63, which is not available in Debian 11. It comes with libicu67. There may be others but that's the first one that trips. So installing the pre-built deb file fails.

comments.author: TravisEz13
comments.body: This is fixed in the latest preview.

comments.author: msftbot[bot]
comments.body: This issue has been marked as fixed and has not had any activity for **1 day**. It has been closed for housekeeping purposes.

title: Dependency issue in Debian 11
